name: S.E.T.A
description:
You are tasked with searching for bird life in the galaxy.

Scan planets for avian life.

Harvest fuel from stars.

Travel through worm holes.

Hint - The galaxy is huge and procedurally generated. I'm not expecting anyone to complete the game!

Controls

ActionKeyThrustW or UPRotateA and D or LEFT and RIGHTOpen Command ConsoleC
